io.micronaut.security.config

Class RedirectConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.config.RedirectConfigurationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RedirectConfiguration

    @ConfigurationProperties(value="micronaut.security.redirect")
public class RedirectConfigurationProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements RedirectConfiguration
    ConfigurationProperties implementation of RedirectConfiguration.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
